successes.title: Epic Card Game
successes.description:
A complete strategy card game from the creators of Star Realms.
Two to four can play sealed, draft or constructed out of one small box!

Pledges.description:
No Frills Tier 
Just the game. No promo cards. No stretch goal rewards.

Gamer Set Tier
With each set you get one copy of the game (enough for 4 players) and you get the year one promo cards. The year one promos are 12 additional cards which will be released to the general public periodically over 2015-16 as event support and prizes. Buy in at this level and you'll get the game and all 12 promo cards before they are available in stores!
Get an additional Gamer Set for every $20 added to your pledge.
With 2 sets you will be able to play sealed deck and draft with up to 8 players, and large formats like Emperor or team draft.

With 3 sets you will own 3 copies of every card in the game, so you can build any constructed deck or create our suggested Epic cube for sealed and draft.
 
For 1 Set, Pledge $20
For 2 Sets, Pledge $40 
For 3 Sets, Pledge $60
Only pay shipping once regardless of how many sets you buy!
